title: Lament at Loon Landing
description: Fakes, folk music, and ghost firesWhen legendary folk singer Lara Fairplay agrees to make her comeback appearance at Pirate Cove’s annual maritime music festival, everyone in the quaint seaside village is delighted—including mystery bookstore owner and sometimes amateur sleuth, Ellery Page.Lara is scheduled to perform a recently discovered piece of music attributed to “the father of American music,” Stephen Foster.Several mysterious accidents later, Ellery is less delighted—especially when it becomes clear to him that someone plans to silence the celebrity songbird forever.
author: Josh Lanyon
